sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' const Testimonials = () => { const testimonials = [ { name: "Sarah Chen", score: "Band 8.5", course: "Academic IELTS", image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1494790108755-2616b612b786?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=crop&w=100&q=80", text: "The speaking practice sessions were incredible! I improved from Band 6.5 to 8.0 in just 2 months. The personalized feedback made all the difference.", rating: 5 }, { name: "Raj Patel", score: "Band 7.5", course: "General Training", image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1472099645785-5658abf4ff4e?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=crop&w=100&q=80", text: "The mock tests and AI analysis helped me identify my weak areas. I never thought I could achieve Band 7.5 in writing!", rating: 5 }, { name: "Emily Rodriguez", score: "Band 8.0", course: "Academic IELTS", image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1438761681033-6461ffad8d80?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=crop&w=100&q=80", text: "Amazing institute! The study materials are comprehensive and the instructors are very supportive. Highly recommended!", rating: 5 } ] const renderStars = (rating) => { return "⭐".repeat(rating) } return (

Success Stories

Hear from our students who achieved their dream scores and transformed their futures.

{testimonials.map((testimonial, index) => (

{testimonial.name}

{testimonial.score} • {testimonial.course}
{renderStars(testimonial.rating)}

"{testimonial.text}"

))}

Average Student Rating: 4.9/5

Based on 1,200+ verified reviews

) } export default Testimonials
